attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As some may already know, there is a proposed 'Broadband Tax' within the UK. It is said that the government will earn £175Million/Year from this tax, and this means a rough £4 increase on your broadband bill, Ontop of VAT. 

This proposal is to void the proposed tax, as this will cause immediate issues, especially in the current economic crisis. The internet is supposed to be a free and creative place, and we already pay the bill for our broadband, why should we have to pay anymore just because the government wants some money.

Please sign the petition if you also do not want the proposed Broadband Tax to be implemented.

Thankyou.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
